page.title: 01MEDIA SURVEY
page.content: A sample media survey,in and around Foulridge revealed the following:- (a) 90% read for pleasure both fiction & non-fiction.Numbers of books read varied between 1 & 144 per year. (b) Vast majority take daily papers.Express,Mail & Mirror most mentioned though Guardian & Telegraph readers not insignificant.Colne Times is the most popular local paper.A number of people take magazines pertaining to hobbies. (c) Whole sample watched television not less than 2 hrs per day with no marked preference for channel.Soap operas apart,nature programmes the most popular. (d) 35% own videos used mainly to record TV programmes. (e) Large % are radio listeners.Most popular stations are Radio 1,2,and local radio.Radio 4 mentioned not 3.
